> Hello,
>   Just to give you a quick background, I am new to JUnit and am also
> fairly new to Java, so bear with me!!  Before JUnit, our company's testing
> procedures consisted of importing an XML document, load it into our
> objects, and compare it against an expected results file. To display the
> results, we utilize ExamDiff.
>

> tests, but not completely.  So, in my test case I added the functionality
